item.title: Anita Bryant, Whose Anti-Gay Politics Undid a Singing Career, Is Dead at 84
item.description: The former beauty queen and spokeswoman for Florida orange juice was an all-American entertainer before she began crusading against L.G.B.T.Q. rights.
